title: Miser's Purse, early 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metal
Technique: knotted netting with beads
description: Knotted netting in dark green silk ornamented with cut steel beads in diamond patterns; side opening controlled by two faceted cut steel rings.  Filigreed cut steel drops at each end.

tombstone.epitaph:
Miser's Purse, early 19th century.
early 19th century. Medium: silk, metal
Technique: knotted netting with beads. Gift of Mrs. Albert Blum. 1953-106-61.
